## dialog
### Actionsheet_COM
``` js
import { Actionsheet } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing the component, use v-model for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">show-cancel</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing the cancel menu |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | cancel(取消) | text of cancel menu |
| <span class="prop-key">menus</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | {} | menu items, for example: `{menu1: 'some text'}`, menu name with `.noop` will not trigger click events |
| <span class="prop-key">close-on-clicking-mask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | if closing when clicking on mask |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu</span> |   (menuKey) | triggers when clicking on the menu |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-{menuKey}</span> |   (menuKey) | shortcut event for easier listening, you can listen on `on-click-menu-delete` if you have a menu named `delete` |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-cancel</span> |   &nbsp; | triggers when clicking on the cancel menu |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/actionsheet">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  更新到 vue@2.0，使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加属性 `close-on-clicking-mask`, 适用于强制选择的场景</span></li></ul>
<br><br><br>
### Alert_COM
``` js
import { Alert } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | visibility of the component, use v-model for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | title |
| <span class="prop-key">button-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | ok(确定) | button text |
| <span class="prop-key">mask-transition</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | vux-fade | mask transition |
| <span class="prop-key">dialog-transition</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | vux-dialog | dialog transition |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | dialog content |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-show</span> |   &nbsp; | emits when dialog is show |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/alert">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-todo">todo</span>  修复动画</span></li></ul>

### Confirm_COM
``` js
import { Confirm } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">show</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | visibility of the component |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | dialog title |
| <span class="prop-key">confirm-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | 确认(confirm) | confirm button text |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | 取消(cancel) | cancel button text |
| <span class="prop-key">mask-transition</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | vux-fade | mask's transition |
| <span class="prop-key">dialog-transition</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | vux-dialog | dialog's transition |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | body content of the dialog |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-cancel</span> |   &nbsp; | triggers when the cancel button is clicked |
| <span class="prop-key">on-confirm</span> |   &nbsp; | triggers when the confirm button is clicked |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/confirm">进入demo页面</a>
<br><br><br>
### Loading_COM
``` js
import { Loading } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | visibility of the component |
| <span class="prop-key">text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | loading text |
| <span class="prop-key">position</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | fixed | position, default is `fixed`, you can use `absolute` |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | content area |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/loading">进入demo页面</a>

<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-fix">fix</span>  i18n 无配置</span></li></ul>

### Toast_COM
``` js
import { Toast } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing toast, use v-model for binding |
| <span class="prop-key">time</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 2000 | show time |
| <span class="prop-key">type</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | success | toast type, success, warn, cancel, text |
| <span class="prop-key">width</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | 7.6em | toast's width |
| <span class="prop-key">isShowMask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | if showing mask, users cannot operate other elements on the page |
| <span class="prop-key">text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | content of the toast, text or html, the same function as default slot |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | default slot, the content of the toast |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description | 
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-show</span> |   &nbsp; | emits when toast shows |
| <span class="prop-key">on-hide</span> |   &nbsp; | emits when toast hides |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/toast">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认不显示遮罩</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加 isShowMask 属性</span></li></ul>
<br><br><br>
